commands.help:
Usage: heroku local [PROCESSNAME] [flags]

run heroku app locally

Flags:
 -e, --env ENV            location of env file (defaults to .env)
 -f, --procfile PROCFILE  use a different Procfile
 -p, --port PORT          port to listen on

Start the application specified by a Procfile (defaults to ./Procfile)

Examples:

    heroku local
    heroku local web
    heroku local web=2
    heroku local web=1,worker=2

Usage: heroku local:start [PROCESSNAME] [flags]

run heroku app locally

Flags:
 -e, --env ENV            location of env file (defaults to .env)
 -f, --procfile PROCFILE  use a different Procfile
 -p, --port PORT          port to listen on

Start the application specified by a Procfile (defaults to ./Procfile)

Examples:

    heroku local
    heroku local web
    heroku local web=2
    heroku local web=1,worker=2

Usage: heroku local:run [flags]

run a one-off command

Flags:
 -e, --env ENV
 -p, --port PORT

Example:

    heroku local:run bin/migrate

Usage: heroku local:version

display node-foreman version

Display node-foreman version
